languages.text: "Утрата саванта — тяжелый удар для круга Лорд-инквизитора. Найти замену Эмелине будет тяжело".
"Losing a Sage is a heavy blow to the Lord Inquisitor's circle. Finding a replacement for Emelina will be a challenge."
languages.original_text: "Утрата саванта — тяжелый удар для круга Лорд-инквизитора. Найти замену Эмелине будет тяжело".

traits.locale_text: "Losing a Sage is a heavy blow to the Lord Inquisitor's circle. Finding a replacement for Emelina will be a challenge."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Losing a Sage is a heavy blow to the Lord Inquisitor's circle. Finding a replacement for Emelina will be a challenge."

traits.locale_text: "Losing a Sage is a heavy blow to the Lord Inquisitor's circle. Finding a replacement for Emelina will be a challenge."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “对大审判官的圈子而言，失去一位贤者是个沉重的打击。想找到能接替艾米莉娜的人并不容易。”
languages.original_text: "Losing a Sage is a heavy blow to the Lord Inquisitor's circle. Finding a replacement for Emelina will be a challenge."

traits.locale_text: “对审判长的圈子而言，失去一位贤者是个沉重的打击。想找到能接替艾米莉娜的人并不容易。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Perdre un sage est toujours un coup dur pour un seigneur inquisiteur. Il ne sera pas aisé de remplacer Emelina. »
languages.original_text: "Losing a Sage is a heavy blow to the Lord Inquisitor's circle. Finding a replacement for Emelina will be a challenge."

traits.locale_text: « Perdre un sage est toujours un coup dur pour un seigneur inquisiteur. Il ne sera pas aisé de remplacer Emelina. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Perder a una sabia es un duro golpe para el círculo del Lord Inquisidor. Encontrar un sustituto para Emelina será todo un reto».
languages.original_text: "Losing a Sage is a heavy blow to the Lord Inquisitor's circle. Finding a replacement for Emelina will be a challenge."

traits.locale_text: «Perder a una sabia es un duro golpe para el círculo del Lord Inquisidor. Encontrar un sustituto para Emelina será todo un reto».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「賢者を失ったのはロード・インクィジターの一団にとって大きな痛手だ。エメリナの代わりを探すのは難しい」
languages.original_text: "Losing a Sage is a heavy blow to the Lord Inquisitor's circle. Finding a replacement for Emelina will be a challenge."

traits.locale_text: 「賢者を失ったのはロード・インクィジターの一団にとって大きな痛手だ。エメリナの代わりを探すのは難しい」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Einen Weisen zu verlieren, ist ein schwerer Schlag für den innersten Kreis des Großinquisitors. Es wird schwierig werden, einen Ersatz für Emelina zu finden."
languages.original_text: "Losing a Sage is a heavy blow to the Lord Inquisitor's circle. Finding a replacement for Emelina will be a challenge."

traits.locale_text: "Einen Weisen zu verlieren, ist ein schwerer Schlag für den innersten Kreis des Großinquisitors. Es wird schwierig werden, einen Ersatz für Emelina zu finden."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Losing a Sage is a heavy blow to the Lord Inquisitor's circle. Finding a replacement for Emelina will be a challenge."

languages.text: "Bir Âlim'i kaybetmek, Lord Engizisyoncu'nun muhitine büyük bir darbe vurdu. Emelina'nın yerine başkasını koymak zor olacak."
languages.original_text: "Losing a Sage is a heavy blow to the Lord Inquisitor's circle. Finding a replacement for Emelina will be a challenge."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Âlim'i kaybetmek, Lord Engizisyoncu'nun muhitine büyük bir darbe vurdu. Emelina'nın yerine başkasını koymak zor olacak."
